title.rendered: We’re supporting Mental Health Awareness Week

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1621000158260{margin-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”]We’re supporting Mind Mental Health Awareness Week. 

We have just launched Falanx Group’s ‘Wellbeing in the Workplace’ policy, outlining our commitment to the time and resources necessary to ensure our workplace mental health. [/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”13731″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column][/vc_column][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
